column4: Hi Guys. I am windows user and new to ubuntu and installed 8.04 using VMware to test it before shifting to Linux. I need to know know how to share files with Win Xp and how to Install Linux Software as their is not exe. What is the linux version of exe.
How do I share file with WinXp from a Ubuntu system. I need it to ask username (just like NTFS)
you would use  apt-get  or  Synaptic  to install software
